name: Quack 'em Dead 2 (But cooler)
description:
A little shooter/bullet hell game i am still working on! It is a new version of the old game called "Quack em dead" and as the title says it is a lot better than the old version.

Note: Play in fullscreen for a better experience, because for whatever reason Itch.io just cuts a bit off of the sides. If found any bugs report them in the comments c:

Credits:

Font by: Clint Bellanger

https://opengameart.org/content/boxy-bold-font

http://clintbellanger.net

Music by: https://ecrettmusic.com
It is AI generated and tbh i did not pay for it because i am broke so uh if you ever notice, uh... i will remove it!

Pro tip; DEATH should not be held with questions, otherwise it will be punished by the victim.
